21076.<if_woman>「着いた 着いた！ ここが モガレキャンプか！\n けっこう:
<if_woman>We're here, we're here! So this is Mogare
Camp! It's so far away! I was so surprised!
Thanks, sis!<else>We're here, we're here! So this is Mogare
Camp! It's so far away! I was so surprised!
Thanks, brother!<endif>

21077.「さーて 賢者ブロッゲンさまは\n どこにいるのかな……。: So, where is Sage Broggen, I wonder...

21078.「あっ！ いたぞ！\n 賢者ブロッゲンさまだー！:
Oh, there he is! There he is! It's the sage
Broggen!

21080.「な な なんでアーールか！？\n この 子供たちはっ！: Why are you doing this? These kids!

21082.「キミたち アグラニの子だね！？\n こんな所まで来て 危ないでしょ！\n いっ:
You're Agrani's kids! You shouldn't have come
all this way! Who are your parents?

21083.「うわー しゃべってる しゃべってる！\n 見ろ ココン！ 先っちょが パカパカ:
Wow, he's talking. He's talking! Look,
Kokon! The tip of his mouth is popping! It's
coming from over there!

21084.「わーい！ もっと おはなししてー！\n なか どうなってるか みせてー！:
Yay! Tell me more stories! Let me see what's
going on inside!

21085.「中？ 中って なんのこと！？\n どうしよう！ ブロッゲンさまは\n 今日も:
Inside? What do you mean inside? What do I
do? Mr. Broggen's sleeping well today.

21087.「ねえねえ なんで ブロッゲンさまは\n いつも 眠ってるの？\n どうして 代:
Why is Lady Broggen always asleep? Why does
Mr. Wand talk instead?

21088.「つえさんは どこで うまれたの？\n おなまえって あるの？\n ヘンな しゃ:
Where was the staff born? Does he have a name?
Why does he talk in a strange way?

21089.「あー！ 同時に たくさん\n 質問しないでほしいでアーーール！:
Aaargh! I wish you wouldn't ask so many
questions at the same time.

21090.こうして 賢者ブロッゲンの杖と\nナツィと ココンの会話は\nふたりが飽きるまで:
And so the conversation between Sage Broggen's
Staff, Nutsy, and Kokon continued until they
both grew tired of it.

21091.「……あー！ 面白かった。\n 杖さんと いっぱい お話ししちゃった。:
...ah! That was fun. I talked a lot with Mr.
Cane.

21092.「ねえねえ 賢者ブロッゲンさま。\n 賢者さまは この杖のスペアとか\n 持って:
Hey, Sage Broggen. Does the sage have a spare
copy of this Sage's Staff or something?

21095.「これは お前たちのような\n 無垢な子供が 触れてよいものではない！:
This is not something innocent children like
yourselves are allowed to touch!

21096.「この杖は わしの犯した\n 罪で できておるのだ……。:
This staff is made of the sins I have
committed.

21098.「……シスター 世話になったな。\n それでは わしは 行くよ。:
Thank you for your hospitality, Sister. Well
then, I'll be going.

21100.「ふむ……。風のウワサに\n 気がかりなことを 耳にしたのでな……。\n シスタ:
Well I've heard some disturbing rumors on the
wind, so don't be too careless, Sister.

21102.「ふむ。なかなか ウデの立つ旅人のようだ。\n ……そうか。<pc>というのか。:
Hmmm. You seem to be quite a skilled traveler. I see. You're called , aren't you? You're the one who brought the kids,
right?

21103.「おお <pc>ではないか。\n しばらくぶりだな。\n お前が 子供たちを連れ:
Oh <pc> isn't it? It's been a while.
You're the one who brought the kids?

21104.「……子供の まっすぐな心は ときに残酷だ。\n それに直面するたびに わしは\:
A child's upright heart is sometimes cruel.
Whenever I'm confronted with it, I feel as if
my heart is being gouged out...

21105.「機会があったら いずれ また会おう。\n ではな……。:
I'll see you again when I get a chance. See
you...

21106.「……ボク ちょっと\n 調子に乗りすぎちゃったかな……。\n ブロッゲンさまを:
I think I got a little carried away and
offended Broggen.

21107.「あの杖が ブロッゲンさまにとって\n そんなに大事なものだったなんて\n 思わ:
I didn't realize that the cane was so
important to Broggen...

21108.<if_woman>「<pc>の お姉ちゃん。\n ここまで連れてきてくれて あ:
<if_woman>Sister of <pc>. Thanks for bringing
me here! Come on down to Agrani so I can thank
you.<else>Brother of <pc>. Thanks for bringing
me here! Come on down to Agrani so I can thank
you.<endif>

32292.「ホホホ。かわいらしい。\n きっと ブロッゲンさまの杖さまが\n めずらしいの:
Hohoho. How cute. I bet Broggen's Staff is a
rarity.

32293.「ま…まあ そう怒りませんでも……。\n 子供たちも ビックリしておりますわ。:
Well... well, don't be so angry, but... the
children are also surprised.

32294.「はい お気をつけて。……ところで\n 世界の様子を見てまわると言って 旅立たれ:
Yes, take care. By the way, why did you return
from your trip to see the world?
